SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.math.geometry

Record Class AffineTransformation2f

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.dua3.utility.math.geometry.AffineTransformation2f
Record Components:
a - Scaling factor for the x-axis.
b - Shearing factor for the x-axis, affecting horizontal skew relative to the y-axis.
c - Translation component for the x-coordinate.
d - Shearing factor for the y-axis, affecting vertical skew relative to the x-axis.
e - Scaling factor for the y-axis.
f - Translation component for the y-coordinate.
public record AffineTransformation2f(float a, float b, float c, float d, float e, float f) extends Record
Defines an affine transformation in form of a matrix 
 
     a b c
     d e f
     0 0 1
.

    • combine

      public static AffineTransformation2f combine(AffineTransformation2f... t)
      Combines multiple affine transformations together.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the combined affine transformation

    • identity

      public static AffineTransformation2f identity()
      Return the identity transformation.
      Returns:
      affine transformation (identity)

    • rotate

      public static AffineTransformation2f rotate(double alpha)
      Create an affine transformation for a rotation around the origin. (x,y) -> (x cos(alpha) - y sin(alpha), x sin(alpha) + y cos(alpha)).
      Parameters:
      alpha - the angle in radians
      Returns:
      affine transformation (rotation)

    • rotate

      public static AffineTransformation2f rotate(double alpha, Vector2f c)
      Create an affine transformation for a rotation around the c. (x,y) -> (x cos(alpha) - y sin(alpha), x sin(alpha) + y cos(alpha)).
      Parameters:
      alpha - the angle in radians
      c - the center of rotation as a vector (translation parameters for x- and y-coordinates)
      Returns:
      affine transformation (rotation)

    • translate

      public static AffineTransformation2f translate(float tx, float ty)
      Create an affine transformation for a translation (x,y) -> (x+u,y+v).
      Parameters:
      tx - the x-value
      ty - the y-value
      Returns:
      affine transformation (translation)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      affine transformation (translation)

      public static AffineTransformation2f scale(float s)

      Returns:
      affine transformation (scale)

    • toMatrixString

      public String toMatrixString()
      a string representation of the matrix elements for the affine transformation.

      This method uses the root locale for formatting.

      Returns:
      a string containing the affine transformation in matrix representation

    • toMatrixString

      public String toMatrixString(Locale locale)
      a string representation of the matrix elements for the affine transformation.

      Example:

           ⎡  1.50   3.70   0.00⎤
     ⎢ -4.00   1.50   0.00⎥
     ⎣  0.00   0.00   1.00⎦
      Parameters:
      locale - the Locale used for formatting
      Returns:
      a string containing the affine transformation in matrix representation
